title: Back fire
description: Elli the Elephant is desperate, dateless and bored watching Backfire, a feature drama where a hunky fire fighting elephant saves a damsel in distress from a towering inferno and takes her off for a sunset romance. After noticing a box of matches and full waste paper bin, she has an idea. What follow is a comedy of errors when the hunky fire fighting elephants end up proving to be bungling fools and she ends up having to save the day.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001116; AFTRS compilation 2006; Active; 2006
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MPEG-2 Digital File; Memory Grid Pod Full Encode
